content.introduction: Git is a distributed version control system...

sections.title: Basic Commands
sections.content: Essential Git commands for daily use...

code.example:
# Initialize repository
git init

# Add files
git add .

# Commit changes
git commit -m "Initial commit"

# Create and switch branch
git checkout -b feature/new-feature

# Merge branches
git checkout main
git merge feature/new-feature
